Articles.Content: Hi guys, anyone knows a good mod that adds cargo bays, for 0.23.5??

B9 is such a BIG mod, I don't tink I'll add it (too much things to load for my PC ).

Just a question: are those cargo bays stock size? ( I mean: same diameter as stock parts, for example Mk 3 or 2.5m)

If yes, I think I'll add only the cargo bays

B9 is such a BIG mod, I don't tink I'll add it (too much things to load for my PC ).

Just a question: are those cargo bays stock size? ( I mean: same diameter as stock parts, for example Mk 3 or 2.5m)

If yes, I think I'll add only the cargo bays

Yes if you only want cargo bays, you can delete everything in b9 except for the cargo bays and (their respective adapters) for attaching to stock parts. Also, Modular plane by Coffee Industries adds some nice plane parts including a good amount of cargo bays for about 40 Mb of memory and even less with ATM

Edit: Mk2 expansion also has one fitted for Mk2 parts specifically

Edited April 29, 2014 by tychochallenge
The mk3 expansion has a mk3 cargo bay and Lacks SXT has 2.5m cargobays

First of all thanks for your suggestions!

Yes if you only want cargo bays, you can delete everything in b9 except for the cargo bays and (their respective adapters) for attaching to stock parts. Also, Modular plane by Coffee Industries adds some nice plane parts including a good amount of cargo bays for about 40 Mb of memory and even less with ATM

Edit: Mk2 expansion also has one fitted for Mk2 parts specifically

Sorry but I didn't get what "ATM" is

First of all thanks for your suggestions!

Sorry but I didn't get what "ATM" is

Aggressive Texture Manager

Aggressive Texture Manager

It's "Active Texture Manager"

It's "Active Texture Management"

Fixed for ya. Now everyone knows why it's referred to as ATM lol

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005-0-23-5-Release-3-1-Active-Texture-Management-Save-RAM-without-reduction-packs%21

What size Cargo bay do you want? If you want small plane cargo bays, I recommend:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80796-0-23-5-Spaceplane-Plus-1-1

If you want bigger ones, I've been meaning to try out this one:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/77505-Cargo-Transportation-Solutions-%28WIP%29

Otherwise, B9 is cool too
CTS Cargo Transport Solutions might work for you.
